briefTitle: Effect of Vildagliptin vs. Glibenclamide on Circulating Endothelial Progenitor Cell Number Type 2 Diabetes

outcomeMeasures.title: Absolute Change in the Endothelial Progenitor Cell (EPC) Number
outcomeMeasures.description: The study primary endpoint was the change from baseline values of the EPC number in the Vildagliptin vs Glibenclamide arm at 4 and 12 months.

outcomeMeasures.title: Absolute Change in HbA1C Compared to Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: The secondary endpoint was the change from baseline values of HbA1C in the Vildagliptin vs Glibenclamide arm at 4 and 12 months
